item.title: Maven lifecycles and plugins explained
item.author: thespamtrapp@gmail.com (Serban Balamaci)
item.description: Maven is much more than just a simple dependency management and packaging tool. Through a set of plugins it becomes a powerful tool for handling the “backbone” of CI setup that might require generating new source files, compile, package, execute bash scripts that for ex.
